rComments: Great teacher who really cared about his students. Ce150 was hard, but Hans Peter was always fair and helpful if you fall behind. Towards the end of the quarter he was struggling with cancer, and had to let a sub take over mostly. I will always remember how encouraging and helpful he was.

This is by far the hardest class I'd ever taken at UCSC. I've never felt so hopeless and defeated for a course. All of his tests averages are beyond low, always under 50%. His tests were nothing like his lectures. During lectures, he only touches topics on the surface, but expected you to know in-depth analysis of topics for tests.

He literally left the end of the quarter and had a substitute teacher wrote the final for us. Just a terrible teacher, I advise you never to take a class he's teaching. Worse professor ever. I can't believe he's actually a teacher at UCSC.

He's the worse teacher I've ever had. His test are difficult, his instructions for ANYTHING is unclear. He doesn't care about his students. He never replies back to his email or piazza. It's mostly the TA doing the work. He's very disorganized. During his lecture, he would ramble about his life and his ppt slides are stolen off of other schools.

You literally will get nothing from his lectures.  If he's not talking about the ancient computers he owned 30 years ago and ignoring his lecture slides entirely, he's either on a massive tangent or he's running through the material you actually need to know as fast as he can make himself speak. Also, no idea how to organize a class or write labs.

This class is already hard, and to have a professor drop the class week 3 made it a lot harder. He made the midterm a lot harder than we expected with an average of 57%. Without the Tutors, TAs, and the computer engineering department this class would have been a disaster.

TERRIBLE PROFESSOR. DO NOT TAKE IT WITH HIM. His lecturing skills are horrible. He does not explain the material thoroughly enough and expect us to know all this  difficult material within the entire lecture. He is terrible at explaining anything.

I feel really bad but at the same time I don't; the professor left the entire class three weeks into the quarter and forced more work onto the TA's and Tutors along with having another professor fill in. Midterms were hard and labs were absolutely atrocious. On top of attending another lecture instead of CE-12's, he didn't even attend the midterm.

TERRIBLE TEACHER. His lectures were boring and mundane. He goes off lecture slides and goes through the material very quick and its almost impossible to learn anything. He left the class halfway through the class and we had to have substitute fill his spot. And the assignments are extremely difficult. This was the worst class I have ever taken.
